titles.title: Financial Security in Retirement Act of 2008
Financial Security in Retirement Act of 2008

To suspend for 2008 and 2009 the required minimum distribution requirements with respect to certain defined contribution plans to the extent the interest of an individual in such plans does not exceed $300,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Financial Security in Retirement Act of 2008 - Suspends, for calendar 2008 and 2009, minimum distribution requirements for up to $300,000 of an individual's interest in all eligible defined contribution plans as of December 31, 2008.
